title.rendered: Wood Crafts Clay Modeling Tool Pottery Carving Tools Shaping and Sculpting for Ceramics Clay Pottery (Set of 5pcs)

content.rendered: Clay Sculpting Tools Polymer Clay Sculpting Tools Set – 5 Pcs Pottery Tool Kit – Ceramic Pottery & Clay Ribbon Wood Modeling Tools Kit (5 Pack)

excerpt.rendered:
Clay tool set for working with clay, plasticine and other modeling compounds

Consists of 5 mini double ended tools , Sturdy plastic tools can be used with all types of clays

urable sculpture tools: these clay modeling tools are made of nice plastic, which is durable and lightweight, you can use them for a rather long time and carry them with you, if needed

The curved end contours delicate feature ,5 styles for different usages, good for carving, shaping, modeling, making dots, scraping, cutting, brushing, smoothing and so on, suitable for detail works

Wide application: these pottery shaping tools are good for both school and home usage, suitable for pottery classes, ceramic classes, making clay projects and so on
